backCardText: A next generation data platform, which forms the infrastructurefor Complex Event Processingand NextGen BaaS Platforms together with AI Services built or performance, scalability and flexibility

AI supported Digital Experience & Commerce Platform to create and deliver personalized, content rich, contextualized digital experiences, complemented by real time analytics and customer data management
An innovative AI supported Complex Event Processing (CEP) Platform to gain real-time insights from business moments and react on them accordingly and timeously
Enabling organisations to deploy and serve AI models in massive scale streaming data production environments
